Name: Vodka Gimlet
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Dry grainy vodka, delicately flavoured and softened by subtly sweetened lemon and lime juice.
History: A vodka-based riff on the classic gin-based Gimlet . Recipe by yours truly, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Vodka Gimlet contains 184 calories
